title: Daiwa Securities takes 5% in Credit Saison in capital tie-up - Nasdaq.com
text: TOKYO, Sept 5 (Reuters) - Japan'sDaiwa Securities  and credit card company Credit Saison  on Thursday announced a capital alliance in which they will develop new services, including a smartphone payment system.
Japan's second-biggest brokerage said it will acquire 5% of Credit Saison's shares, while Credit Saison will buy up to 2 billion yen ($19 million), around 0.3%, in Daiwa shares.
